short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PageBuddy generates concise, accurate summaries of the content on any webpage you're visiting. Save time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of reading long articles and blog posts? PageBuddy to the Rescue!

PageBuddy is an intelligent Chrome Sidebar designed to make your browsing more efficient by providing a summary of the main ideas of the web page.

Features:
- A friend in the Sidebar: Open the sidebar or click on the PageBuddy icon in the browser to turn it on.
- Summary History: The sidebar keeps a history of summaries for all your visited pages. Easy to review.
- Pay no additional cost: Use your OpenAI API Key. It is stored locally in your browser and not sent anywhere else.
